name: Airpod

name: Body Spray
description: The body spray has a lightweight and non-greasy formula, allowing it to easily glide onto your skin, leaving behind a subtle and long-lasting aroma that will keep you smelling amazing from morning to night. âœ¨ With its convenient and travel-friendly packaging, our Body Spray is perfect for on-the-go touch-ups, ensuring you never have to worry about feeling anything less than fabulous.
